results.title: Association between metformin and neurodegenerative diseases of observational studies: systematic review and meta-analysis
results.text_hl: Subgroup analysis showed @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ exposure increased the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@Parkinson disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@PD@@@) by 66% (OR 1.66, 95% CI 1.14 to 2.42).
